required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of ITI 333 in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single Ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of ITI 333 in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The study will be conducted as a single-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, ascending dose study in up to 8 sequential cohorts of healthy subjects. Each cohort will enroll 8 subjects: 6 subjects will receive ITI-333 and 2 subjects will receive placebo as a single oral dose after a fast of at least 10 hours.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Sequential ascending doses. Parallel (active, placebo) within each cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with treatment-emergent adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in systolic and diastolic blood pressure
Change from baseline in ECG QT interval
Change from baseline in white blood cell count
Change from baseline in aspartate aminotransferase
Change from baseline in alanine aminotransferase

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration time curve from time zero to the last measurable of concentration of ITI-333 and potential metabolites

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration (ITI-333 and potential metabolites) time curve from time zero to infinity

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma concentration of ITI-333 and potential metabolites

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum concentration of ITI-333 and potential metabolites in plasma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Terminal elimination half-life of ITI-333 and potential metabolites

secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
predose and multiple timepoints up to 48 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution of ITI-333
